## SessionCookieValidationResult interface

Return type from a function to validate cookie contents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SessionCookieValidationResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isValid](./opensearch-dashboards.sessioncookievalidationresult.isvalid.md) | boolean | Whether the cookie is valid or not. |
|  [path?](./opensearch-dashboards.sessioncookievalidationresult.path.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The "Path" attribute of the cookie; if the cookie is invalid, this is used to clear it. |
